meanings.definition: A group of singers or dancers performing together.
meanings.sent1: The school choir formed a korus to sing at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The korus of voices blended beautifully in harmony.
meanings.sent3: The korus of dancers moved gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent4: The korus of birds chirping in the morning was like a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The korus of laughter filled the room with joy.

meanings.sent1: The catchy korus of the song stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent2: Everyone sang along to the familiar korus of the anthem.
meanings.sent3: The korus of the song was so catchy, I couldn't stop humming it.
meanings.sent4: The korus of the song echoed in my mind like a sweet melody.
meanings.sent5: The korus of the song was the highlight of the performance.
